A feedback on the "Chats" screen Hi. Just a little feedback. Could you add a feature to the "Chats" screen, where when I'm at the one of the last chats in the list, I can press the mast head saying "Chats" to move to the top of the list. I guess you have this feature for the iPhone. It'd be a small but useful addition. Full Review
